summary: The diff touches the Circle members list component, but the provided truncated excerpt does not clearly show removal of the relationship intent text/badge. Additionally, two modified meta/documentation files introduce unrelated feature descriptions (routes, onboarding/profile intent changes, backend model rollout notes) that are outside the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the Circle page’s Members tab, stop displaying each member’s relationship intent (romantic/friendship/both) in the members list UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The only relevant UI file shown (CircleMembersList.tsx) is truncated before any area where relationship intent might be rendered, so the diff summary does not provide evidence that intent text/badges were removed from member rows.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend TypeScript build passes without unused imports/types related to relationship intent in the members list component.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show whether any relationship-intent-related imports/types previously used by the members list were removed (or whether any now remain unused). The shown imports do not reference relationship intent, but the excerpt is incomplete.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes described as removing the romantic/friendship intent onboarding step and defaulting RelationshipIntent for new profiles.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states non-goals: do not change onboarding/profile setup behavior or backend APIs/models for relationship intent; change is limited to Circle Members list display. The diff includes a modified summary file asserting these onboarding/profile changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of a deep-link-only /closest-connections route and multiple unrelated UI/route changes (header/logout behavior, bottom nav redesign, feed/notifications/status detail changes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55, which is limited to hiding relationship intent in the Circle Members list UI; these are unrelated feature descriptions included in the modified summary file.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state update describing a rollout to a two-sided circle membership model and planned future member-side surfaces.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55 and outside the scope of a UI-only change to hide relationship intent in the Circle Members list.
